text: Vassalboro Community School (VCS) is a school district in Vassalboro, Maine, as well as its single grade school. Vassalboro was a part of Kennebec Valley Consolidated Schools (AOS92) until July 1, 2018.Home. Kennebec Valley Consolidated Schools. Retrieved on September 5, 2018. title: Vassalboro Community School
